title: Textile, 1801–50
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed, painted
description: Printed fabric, quilted and lined, in the shape of a chair back. Spray of naturalistic flowers in reds and blues, foliage in brown. Background has a sprig design in light brown against a dark brown ground. Some of the blue color appears to be painted in.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1801–50.
1801–50. Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed, painted. Gift of Harold M. Bailey. 1960-79-4.
